message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. Would you like to make an offer on this exceptional item?
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you place on it. I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $8500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price. How about we discuss a price of $11000?
I understand your position, but I believe we can find a middle ground. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $9800.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $10500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to ensure I get a fair deal.
I respect your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $10000 for the product.

I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not sure I want to go any lower. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $10500, or I'll have to consider other options.
Considering our previous negotiations, I believe we can agree on a price of $10200 for the product.

I'm not willing to go much higher, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but I'm not sure I can go any further. I'm starting to think I should explore other options, but I want to give you one last chance to make a serious offer.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Based on our discussions, I am willing to offer $10300 for the product.
